nodes.name: notifyRedemptionProofTimedOut

increaseRedemptionFee(DepositUtils.Depos.details: This sends us back to AWAITING_WITHDRAWAL_SIGNATURE.

notifyRedemptionProofTimedOut(DepositUti.details: This is considered fraud, and is punished.

notifyRedemptionSignatureTimedOut(Deposi.details: This is considered fraud, and is punished.

provideRedemptionProof(DepositUtils.Depo.details: The signers will be penalized if this is not called.

params._bitcoinHeaders: An array of tightly-packed bitcoin headers.
params._merkleProof: The merkle proof of inclusion of the tx in the bitcoin block.
params._txIndexInBlock: The index of the tx in the Bitcoin block (0-indexed).
params._txInputVector: All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs.
params._txOutputVector: All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs.

provideRedemptionSignature(DepositUtils..details: The signers will be penalized if this (or provideRedemptionProof) is not called.

params._s: Signature S value. Should be in the low half of secp256k1 curve's order.

redemptionTransactionChecks(DepositUtils.details: We only look at the first input and first output. Revert if we find the wrong UTXO or value recipient.                         It's safe to look at only the first input/output as anything that breaks this can be considered fraud                         and can be caught by ECDSAFraudProof.

params._txInputVector: All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs.
params._txOutputVector: All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs.

redemptionTransactionChecks(DepositUtils.return: The value sent to the redeemer's public key hash.

requestRedemption(DepositUtils.Deposit s.details: The redeemer specifies details about the Bitcoin redemption transaction.

transferAndRequestRedemption(DepositUtil.details: The redeemer specifies details about the Bitcoin redemption tx and pays for the redemption                             on behalf of _finalRecipient.

params._finalRecipient: The address to receive the TDT and later be recorded as deposit redeemer.

increaseRedemptionFee(DepositUtils.Depos.notice: Anyone may notify the contract that a fee bump is needed.

notifyRedemptionProofTimedOut(DepositUti.notice: Anyone may notify the contract that the signers have failed to produce a redemption proof.

notifyRedemptionSignatureTimedOut(Deposi.notice: Anyone may notify the contract that the signers have failed to produce a signature.

provideRedemptionProof(DepositUtils.Depo.notice: Anyone may provide a withdrawal proof to prove redemption.

provideRedemptionSignature(DepositUtils..notice: Anyone may provide a withdrawal signature if it was requested.

redemptionTransactionChecks(DepositUtils.notice: Check the redemption transaction input and output vector to ensure the transaction spends                         the correct UTXO and sends value to the appropriate public key hash.

requestRedemption(DepositUtils.Deposit s.notice: Only TDT holder can request redemption,                             unless Deposit is expired or in COURTESY_CALL.

transferAndRequestRedemption(DepositUtil.notice: Anyone can request redemption as long as they can.                             approve the TDT transfer to the final recipient.
